title: How can I access the Playstation Forums?

sections.title: Symptoms
content:
• I have received my Unity Playstation license from Sony
  • I would like to gain access to the Playstation developer forums

sections.title: Cause
content: Forums are a useful tool for interacting with other developers and solving common problems, not to mention networking. We do not however have a PS developer area within our Unity Forums in the way that we do for XBox developers.

sections.title: Resolution
content: Unity does not have a dedicated Playstation area in our forums. We advise all our PS developers to talk to their Sony representatives about gaining access to this forum.
